data.title: Very clean
data.text: We stayed here for one night. The room we stayed in had two comfortable queen beds, super clean, with a clean bathroom. Our room had hair dryer, iron board, iron, coffee maker (with kcups, sugar, coffee mate, tea), small fridge (no mini bar), flat screen TV. The front desk person was very pleasant and friendly. She brought us fresh cookies when she saw we were drinking coffee. Check-in process was fast. They do offer free breakfast.

data.title: Clean rooms, convenient location, less than average value
data.text:
This property has nice rooms, comfortable beds and is clean.  The staff are very friendly and they've added some nice touches (like Halloween candy and fresh fruit) at the front desk to make it feel welcoming and comfortable.  The breakfast attendant was both friendly and efficient. The in room coffee was good (stronger than what was downstairs). Breakfast choices were adequate...LOVED that they had Cholula hot packets. 

Here's "my" downside, the location of the property is very noisy off of a busy street, I didn't like.  Also I thought the daily rate of $345 dollars a night is outrageous for a Holiday Inn and Suite. I realize that pricing is different in different markets but at this price point I expect to see real glasses and mugs in my room as well as actual silverware and real plates in the dining room.  I'm not talking china (although that would be nice) but I do not expect or like to see thin plastics and styrofoam.  Yuck.

data.title: Road Trip stop
data.text: What a lovely hotel.  Staff are delightful, room was modern, very roomy, fresh and clean.  Unfortunately no pool, but could use the Best Western across the road if needed.  Breakfast was excellent, guest laundry (FREE !) with immaculate Bosch machines.  Work table rolled away under another, thereby leaving more "dumping" room.  Great idea.

data.title: Holiday Inn Express, El Camino Real, Santa Clara
data.text:
You know what you are getting with HI Express. This one is fairly modern, rooms a reasonable size and plenty of parking. Breakfast offerings very good and there are lots of local restaurants nearby.

Can be expensive especially if there is a game on at nearby Levi Stadium.

data.title: Great experience
data.text: We really liked our stay here from the friendly receptionist, the clean and spacious room, the helpful breakfast lady, the free fruit/cookie at check in, and the close location to a shopping center. Breakfast was typical - yogurts, breads, cinnamon rolls, cereal, pancake maker, eggs, sausage, gravy, etc.

data.title: Good Value and Experience
data.text:
Spent 8 nights at this property while working from Sunnyvale, CA, about 4 miles away. Location for my work was not closest hotel but well worth the extra drive. The hotel is located on El Camino in South Santa Clara with many close Korean restaurants. Target and Sprouts a short drive away.

The property has been renovated with spacious rooms, 40 inch Samsung LCD TV, Keurig coffee machine, microwave and refrigerator. There is a large volume Bosche clothes washer and dryer available for complementary use. Supplies are for sale at the reception.

Breakfast is full breakfast buffet. Hardboiled eggs, Hot eggs, Waffles, Fruit & berries, Breads, Cereal, Milk, Juice, Coffee. There are fresh cookies in the afternoon. Coffee and water available on demand in the breakfast room.

Staff were friendly and responsive to my special requests and needs.

data.title: Nice
data.text: I stayed at this location for five nights while exploring all around the bay.  The room was clean but just a little worn, but nothing to complain about.  Breakfast was adequate other than strange tasting orange juice (hooray for nearby stores and a mini fridge).  The staff was pleasant and helpful, location was convenient and quiet, Wi-Fi was dependable and generally fast enough for streaming when I tried.  Overall a great stay at a good price considering the market.

data.title: Careful when booking!  Two on same street!
data.text: Stayed here on a business trip. My colleague booked first and emailed a link so I could book in the same hotel. The link takes you to the IHS 'find a hotel' page. I put in Santa Clara, found a property on El Camino Real, and booked a room (prepaid). Only when trying to check in did we discover there are two IHS Holiday Inn and Suites both on El Camino Real in Santa Clara, and I was booked at one, and my colleague the other. They are literally two blocks apart. The bad news was, the one I booked would not release my reservation so I could stay at the same hotel as my work colleague, because it was prepaid and "that was their policy". Hence only three stars for my review. Otherwise, it would be 4-5 stars. It was a decent property, clean and modern. But inflexible!

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites - Santa Clara, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear John L,

Thank you for taking the time to post a candid review during your business travel. It is nice to read that you have regarded our hotel to be clean and modern. However, it is regrettable you were not satisfied with the service you received with regards to the cancellation policy. It is certainly not our intent to inconvenience our valued customers. We always appreciate comments from our guests, and welcome any opportunity to improve.

Again, thank you for sharing your thoughts and I hope that you will consider us again on your future travels. 

Sincerely,

Dianne L.
Case Manager
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice Hotel
data.text: After an afternoon in San Francisco we drove to this hotel to stay for one night with a family of five. Staff were nice and friendly and they were quick to check us in. Room was clean and comfortable for five people, including the pull out sofa. Buffet breakfast was also good. Would recommend this hotel for sure.

data.title: Excellent Service, Love it  :)
data.text: The front desk people were so very nice, especially Lynn. My friend got sick, so I came down to bring breakfast for us. Lynn helped me pack, prepare, and bring them to my room. She is very friendly, patient, and has a big service mind. I would like to say thank you, and I would recommend this hotel for you all. :)

data.title: No surprises - clean and spacious rooms, good services
data.text:
What you expect from a Holiday Inn. Nice, clean, large rooms with good working facilities. Good location.
Lost a star because of lousy shower head and water pressure.
Good location, next to a shopping plaza with a Target store.

data.title: Nice no frills property
data.text:
Was greeted nicely on arrival. Asked for a bigger room, was given a decent size room.
Parking is sufficient for the place.
The breakfast is not a grand one, but not bad. Live counter is however missing.
Go for it if you get it for cheap as this is a no frills properly

data.title: Good choice for the area
data.text:
This was a quick, arrive late / leave early visit.  Check- in was quick and easy, the staff efficient and friendly.  The property is on El Camino and there are plenty of restaurant options around.  
My room (no. 219) was clean, modern and spacious.  It also had lots of AC outlets and USB charging points where I needed them.  There was a coffee service, mini- fridge, bar sink and microwave.
The parking lot was full after I returned from dinner with friends, but there was enough nearby street parking that it was OK.
Breakfast was simple but good, and the staff had everything clean and well- stocked.  The breakfast space was not large but I had no trouble finding seating.
All in all, it was a short but good stay.  Definitely a good choice for the area.

owner_response.text:

Although, you did have a quick visit, it is nice to know you had a great stay with all the amenities the rooms had that were convenient for you. With the demand of the area, we get booked 100% during the weekdays or when there is a special event, which makes our parking lot full, but there is safe street parking. I hope we have the opportunity to accommodate you again on your future visit in the Santa Clara area! 

Best regards,
Melissa C.
Front Desk Representative
Holiday Inn Express Santa Clara

data.title: A No Surprise Place to Stay for a Business Travel
data.text: This hotel is located close to the heart of Santa Clara business district and well accessible from the rest of the bay area. The hotel is like any other Holiday Inn Express - a no nonsense no surprise place to stay for both business and leisure travel. There are many places to eat around it.

data.title: Business Trip
data.text: I stayed in this hotel from one week due to a business trip, I found it very comfortable since it has spacious rooms, warm environment, it is perfect to rest, pretty room decoration and you can easily stay there one day because it has a kitchenette where you can easily warm food and wash dishes. It has a really good location for business trips, since it's very close to many companies and close to restaurants and supermarkets.

data.title: Wonderful Hotel Experience
data.text: When I checked into the hotel, the staff greeted me with smiles and were very prompt in checking me in. Wen I arrived to my room, they called me to see if everything was OK with the room. The room was quiet and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this hotel to everyone.

data.title: Clean, New, Quite, Plush
data.text:
Sumptuous bedding.  Fitted sheets.  Plush mattress pad and comforter.  Very clean and new throughout.  I just loved the bed!

Had a separate sink with a long faucet good for filling water bottles.

Very quiet.  Some hotels you run the fan just to block out the noise but this place was just plain quiet.

data.title: The Front Desk Saved the Day
data.text: In the industry I work in, it is crucial to have business trips planned and paid for as soon as possible. So when a technical error caused my credit card authorization and reservation to be lost, I was in a complete panic. The guest I was booking travel for was checking in on Monday and I had no time to lose. Front desk was not only able to connect me to departments that found my reservation, they managed to take my last minute credit card authorization and process it within a couple hours. Though it is not a required step, they emailed me once everything had processed. Thank you to Shami  and everyone else who assisted me. Without you guys, the travel would never have processed in time. To talk to 4 different people at a hotel, all of whom have amazing customer service, is a rare thing.

data.title: Reasonable hotel
data.text:
I recently stayed here on a business trip.

The hotel is OK, but nothing amazing.

The rooms are comfortable, with large, comfy beds.  They are equipped with a large (good) TV, microwave, fridge and coffee making facilities.

Unlike many hotels, this one has plug sockets and charging points galore! 

The room has A/C and a reasonable bathroom.

The downsides of the room were that the fridge was noisy and there is no in room safe.  Also, upon arrival the room really smelt of stale beer (which went after leaving the window open for a while).

The reception staff are reasonably helpful and helped me change to a quieter room.

The breakfast was very mediocre.  Compared to Holiday Inn in the UK it was very poor, but then the UK ones set the bar very high!

The hotel is located on a busy road, surrounded by fast food places (Japanese, Denny's, Burger King etc..)

The room rate varied from $170 to over $220 (excluding taxes).

Overall, this is just average, and for the money I've stayed in better (but also stayed in worse).

owner_response.author: IHGCare, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites - Santa Clara, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear James N,

Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are glad that you found our rooms to be comfortable and our beds to be large. However, we would like to apologize for falling short of your expectations regarding our breakfast selection. We also regret the issues you had with the first room you were given. We give the utmost importance to our guest comments as they help us improve and continually provide the best guest experience possible. In addition, your feedback has been forwarded to our management to ensure similar situations can be avoided in the future.

Again, our apologies for the inconvenience and we hope to have another opportunity to provide you a much better experience.

Sincerely,

Joel A
Case Manager
IHGCare
owner_response.title: Owner Response
